Line.text: “HE WHO DARES TEST THE CIRCLES’ ORDER…"
“HE WHO UNDERSTANDS NOTHING OF HIS OWN REALITY, YET SEEKS THE KNOWLEDGE OF OTHERS…"
“I SHALL HAVE MERCY UPON YOU ONLY BUT LONG ENOUGH TO WATCH YOU SUFFER THE AGONY OF TRUE POWER…"
“ONLY ONCE YOU HAVE COME TO UNDERSTAND THE PAIN OF A GOD, SHALL I SHOW YOU YOUR TRUE NATURE."
“ONLY THEN, SHALL I STRIKE YOU DOWN INTO THE VOID AT THE HEART OF YOUR CHERISHED SELFHOOD. FOR HE WHO KNOWS NOT HIS PLACE CAN KNOW ONLY STRUGGLE."
“ACCEPT THIS, MY CHALLENGE, AND MEET ME IN BATTLE AT THIS PLANET’S HOUR OF UNBIRTH."
